```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(corrplot)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)
library(factoextra)
library(ade4)
library(FactoMineR)
library(readxl)
```

## ------------------------------LECTOR DE ARCHIVOS-----------------------------

## READ CLIENTES
```{r}
clientes<-read.csv("db/clients.csv", sep = ",", header = T)
head(clientes,3)
```

## READ PRODUCTOS
```{r}
require("readxl")
productos<-readxl::read_xlsx("db/products.xlsx", sheet=1)
head(productos,1)
```

## READ VENTAS
```{r}
ventas<-read.table("db/ventas.tsv",sep = '\t', header = TRUE)
head(ventas,1)
```

## ------------------------------TIPOS DE DATOS---------------------------------
## SUMMARY
```{r}
summary(clientes)
summary(productos)
summary(ventas)
```

## ------------------------------VALORES ATIPICOS-------------------------------
## BOXPLOT
```{r}
boxplot(clientes$)
```
